title: Experienced Social Media Manager
job_overview:
Company: Catch America
Work Hours: 6:00 AM – 2:00 PM PDT (8 hours/day, 40 hours/week)
Rate: $6–$8/hour (based on experience)

What You’ll Do:
Plan, create, and publish engaging content across multiple social media platforms.
Manage posting schedules and maintain consistent brand voice.
Monitor engagement, trends, and analytics to optimize content performance.
Respond to comments, messages, and engage with our online community.
Collaborate with internal team for campaigns, promotions, and launches.
Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and tools.

Requirements:
We are looking for  Social Media Manager with atleast 1-2 years experience.
Proven background in managing social media accounts and growing engagement.
Strong English communication skills (written and verbal).
Portfolio of previous work (content creation, engagement reports, etc.).
Familiarity with tools like Canva, Later, Meta Business Suite, or similar.
Ability to work full time, 6 AM – 2 PM PDT (Pacific Time).
Strong attention to detail, creativity, and ability to work independently.


How to Apply:
Please attach the following:
Your updated resume.
A portfolio showcasing your previous social media work.


Applicants without a resume and portfolio will not be entertained. Thank you!

Deadline of Application: July 31, 2025
